QuestData.Title: Bad Apples
QuestData.Description: That fruit over there? That's a pale imitation to what I can grow.$b$bBut that accursed Daglir somehow manages to gain the favor of the courts, so we must dine on mediocrity!$b$bWe must teach Daglir a lesson for stealing my crop, but we must be discreet.$b$bOutside the shield grows a purple flower called Shadowbloom. Fetch some for me and we'll make sure that he pays dearly for his insolence!
QuestData.CompletionText: I would avoid eating any food until you've washed your hands.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. This will be enough for my purposes.
